#NFL 2019-2020 EDA 

#Phil Ramontal


#Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#Data Import
nfl_19 <- read.csv("pbp-2019.csv")
nfl_19$GameDate <- as.Date(nfl_19$GameDate)
view(nfl_19)
```

```{r}
#NFL Week 1 2019
nfl <- nfl_19 [nfl_19$GameDate >= "2019/09/05" & nfl_19$GameDate <= "2019/09/08",]
#Plays with less than 4 yards to get 1st down
nfl_togo<- filter(nfl, ToGo < 4)

#4th down Offensive plays of team from their own 40 to the opposing teams goal line
nfl_4th <- nfl_togo [nfl_togo$Down == "4" & nfl_togo$YardLine >= "60",]
```

```{r}
ggplot(nfl_4th, mapping = aes(x = ToGo, y = PlayType, fill = Formation)) + geom_histogram(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") 
```


```{r}
#Defensive plays inside the 40 yard line 
nfl_defense <- filter(nfl, nfl$YardLine <= "59")

sacked <- grep("SACKED",nfl_defense$Description)
fumble <- grep("FUMBLED",nfl_defense$Description)

```
